mapper.select: SELECT HEIGHT , WEIGHT , EYESEGHT , COLORBLIND , BLOOD_TYPE AS bloodType, MEDICAL_HISTORY AS medicalHistory, RELIGION , EMP_NO AS empNo, HOBBY , TALENT , REALESTATE, LIFE_LEVEL AS lifeLevel, LIVING , CITIZENSHIP , PERRESI , CTY_NAME AS ctyName FROM HM_PERCONALDATE_INFO where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HM_PERCONALDATE_INFO ( HEIGHT , WEIGHT , EYESEGHT , COLORBLIND , BLOOD_TYPE , MEDICAL_HISTORY , RELIGION , EMP_NO , HOBBY , TALENT , REALESTATE , LIFE_LEVEL , LIVING , CITIZENSHIP , PERRESI , CTY_NAME ) VALUES ( #{height}, #{weight}, #{eyeseght}, #{colorblind}, #{bloodType}, #{medicalHistory}, #{religion}, #{empNo}, #{hobby}, #{talent}, #{realestate}, #{lifeLevel}, #{living}, #{citizenship}, #{perresi}, #{ctyName} )
mapper.update: update HM_PERCONALDATE_INFO set HEIGHT =#{height}, WEIGHT =#{weight}, EYESEGHT =#{eyeseght}, COLORBLIND =#{colorblind}, BLOOD_TYPE =#{bloodType}, MEDICAL_HISTORY =#{medicalHistory}, RELIGION =#{religion}, HOBBY =#{hobby}, TALENT =#{talent}, REALESTATE =#{realestate}, LIFE_LEVEL =#{lifeLevel}, LIVING =#{living}, CITIZENSHIP =#{citizenship}, PERRESI =#{perresi}, CTY_NAME =#{ctyName} where EMP_NO =#{empNo}
